Uses of Class
edu.smcm.ai.search.State

  • Packages that use State 
    Package Description
    edu.smcm.ai.search
    This package contains classes that implement a set of abstract classes for classical search problems.
    edu.smcm.ai.sliding_block
    This package contains all of the classes implementing the Sliding Block Puzzle environment for use in the algorithms in edu.smcm.ai.search.
